segments.text: Good afternoon , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like a cheeseburger and a large order of French fries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like anything to drink with that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To go , please . ( The attendant hands the customer his order . )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll be $ 4 . 25 ... ( The customer gives her a 5 dollar bill . ) ... out of five . Here is your change , sir . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S1
